author: aconway
msg: Fix "Ignoring frame while closing connection" warnings in a cluster broker giving an update.

author: aconway
msg: Fix "Session was not closed cleanly" warnings in a cluster broker giving an update.

author: aconway
msg: More generous overrun threshold for cluster timer to avoid excessive warnings.

author: rbowen
msg: Bring this doc a little further into this century. Considering dropping,
or at least rewriting, most of the "Background" section.

author: arkurth
msg: Fixed bug in DataStructure.pm get_computer_private_ip_address(). The regex that locates the line in /etc/hosts for the computer was modified to allow for both the short hostname and full DNS name in the hosts line.  Also added a warning message to _automethod if an attempt is made to call $self->data->[sub name], where [sub name] doesn't begin with 'set' or 'get'.
